item.title: Traffic Collision and Avoidance System (TCAS) – Resolution Advisory (RA) Dual Display System(s) – One Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative on the non-flying pilot side provided:

numlitem.para: TA and RA visual display is operative on the flying pilot side, and
TA and RA audio function is operative on the flying pilot side.

note.para: Pilot with the operative Advisory and Display System must act as Pilot Flying.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "____TCAS INOP and ____RESOLUTION ADV SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
